explanation: [0-0] The screen is divided into three parts, the upper and lower parts are black screens, and a glass of water is placed in the middle.

[0-10] A hand puts a frozen strawberry into a glass of water. Then the strawberry is taken out, covered with a thick layer of ice. Then the scene switches to a room with a glass of water on the table. A white fluffy object uses a sign to insert a strawberry into the water, then the strawberry and the water in the cup freeze together. Then the strawberry is taken out, covered with ice shards. Then the picture switches to a room with a large green balloon on the table. A man in red clothes stands by the table, squeezing an orange with both hands. The squeezed orange juice drips onto the balloon, then the balloon explodes. The man is surprised and opens his mouth wide, raises his hands, and sits on the chair behind him. Then the scene switches to a white table in a room, with a blue balloon and a fluffy white object on it. The object holds a yellow tool and slowly moves to the blue balloon. Before touching the balloon, the balloon explodes, and three exclamation marks appear on the screen.

[10-16] Then the screen changes to a three-part screen, the upper and lower parts are black screens, a hand sprinkles some white particles on a table, and then erects an egg on it. Then the scene switches to a white fluffy object holding a golden spoon filled with white particles. It pours the particles onto a white table, then uses tweezers to clamp an egg and place it on the white particles. The egg stands successfully.

[16-22] Then the picture switches to a man wearing a gray shirt, sitting by the table in the room, wearing gloves and safety glasses. He holds a glass bottle in his left hand, the bottle is plugged with a stopper, and holds a heating plate in his right hand, applying it to the upper part of the bottle. A red arrow icon appears in the middle of the picture. Then the picture zooms in, the man widens his eyes, and sees the stopper on the bottle slowly coming out, then the stopper flies up, the liquid in the bottle splashes out, and the man opens his mouth in surprise. Then the picture switches to a white cat wearing a brown sweater and a safety helmet on its head, holding a heating plate in each paw. Then the scene switches to an exquisitely shaped yellow bottle on the table, with a golden cap on top, and two heating plates clamping the top of the bottle. White subtitles appear on the picture, and then the cap on the bottle pops out.
